title: Does anyone else experience connection issues in the Champion Select (new client)
body: Almost every game I play I get connection issues in the client, and I either get a leave or wrong masteries, I noticed this never happens in normal games, but ALWAYS in ranked games, when I get into the actual game I never get any connection issues at all, only in the champion select... so what should I do ? Send a support ticket or is this the problem with the game itself or not me...HALP

replies.body: It sounds like you have an unstable connection, and it might be coincidence that it just happens during ranked.  Nevertheless, it's a sucky situation!  I suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help strengthen whatever is causing your connection to champion select to degrade.  I also recommend using[ low-spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) just inn case any pc stress could get in the way.  I hope that helps!

You've said this on several comments like this, but it has obly happened since the new update for me. This isn't connection, this is your client acting up and massively penalizing people for things your messed up system does.
